mapper.select: select * from (SELECT ooo.customer_name, ooo.create_man, ooo.charge_man, bcc.* FROM b_crm_contacts bcc LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cus_vo.customer_name, cus_vo.create_man, cus_vo.charge_man, cus_vo.customer_id FROM ( SELECT crm_cus.*, crm1.realname AS create_man FROM ( SELECT cus.*, crm.realname AS charge_man FROM b_crm_customer cus LEFT JOIN crm_user crm ON cus.charge_user_id = crm.user_id ) crm_cus LEFT JOIN crm_user crm1 ON crm_cus.create_user_id = crm1.user_id ) cus_vo ) ooo ON bcc.customer_id = ooo.customer_id) last

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ooo.customer_name, ooo.create_man, ooo.charge_man, bcc.* FROM b_crm_contacts bcc LEFT JOIN ( SELECT cus_vo.customer_name, cus_vo.create_man, cus_vo.charge_man, cus_vo.customer_id FROM ( SELECT crm_cus.*, crm1.realname AS create_man FROM ( SELECT cus.*, crm.realname AS charge_man FROM b_crm_customer cus LEFT JOIN crm_user crm ON cus.charge_user_id = crm.user_id ) crm_cus LEFT JOIN crm_user crm1 ON crm_cus.create_user_id = crm1.user_id ) cus_vo ) ooo ON bcc.customer_id = ooo.customer_id ) last WHERE last.NAME LIKE '%${value}%' OR last.mobile LIKE '%${value}%' OR last.telephone LIKE '%${value}%'

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_crm_contacts ( name, mobile, telephone, email, sex, address, post, policy_decision, contacts_remarks, create_time, update_time, customer_id ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{mobile}, #{telephone}, #{email}, #{sex}, #{address}, #{post}, #{policy_decision}, #{contacts_remarks}, #{create_time}, #{update_time}, #{customer_id})
